amendatorysection.catchline: Acceptance of waste by facility; when.
amendatorysection.para: No waste shall be accepted by the facility until the amendments to the Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact contained in Laws 1991, LB 837, are in effect in Kansas, Oklahoma, Louisiana, and Arkansas and have been ratified by Congress.

crossreference.para: Central Interstate Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact, withdrawal, see section 71-3522.
